about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I'm Abdeltawab Sha`ban, a 27-year-old front-end developer from Egypt. With hands-on experience in building dynamic user interfaces and an online store using ReactJS, I'm passionate about learning and continuously evolving to stand out in the competitive tech industry, prove my worth, and leave a strong impact.

With hands-on experience in building dynamic user interfaces and an online store using ReactJS, I'm passionate about learning and continuously evolving to stand out in the competitive tech industry, prove my worth, and leave a strong impact.

journey.title: Professional Journey
journey.subtitle: Explore my career path and the experiences that have shaped my expertise in web development.

1.description: Developed responsive web applications and landing pages for various clients. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect UI components using React and Next.js.

achievements.0: Improved website performance by 40% through optimization
achievements.1: Implemented modern design systems and component libraries

2.description: Worked on developing user interfaces for web applications. Focused on creating responsive designs and implementing interactive features using modern JavaScript frameworks.

achievements.0: Developed key features for the main product dashboard
achievements.1: Reduced load times by 30% through code optimization
achievements.2: Mentored junior developers on best practices

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Discover my technical skills and expertise across various technologies and frameworks.

items.1: Abdeltawab delivered exceptional work on our e-commerce platform. His attention to detail and technical expertise made the project a huge success.
items.2: Working with Abdeltawab was a pleasure. He understood our requirements perfectly and delivered a beautiful, responsive website that exceeded our expectations.
items.3: Abdeltawab's ability to translate designs into pixel-perfect code is remarkable. He's reliable, professional, and delivers high-quality work consistently.
